member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.Scripts
member.summary: Represents a type that allows queuing and rendering script elements.

member.name: P:System.Web.Optimization.Scripts.DefaultTagFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the default format string for defining how script tags are rendered.
member.returns: The default format string for defining how script tags are rendered.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Scripts.Render(System.String[])
member.summary: Renders script tags for the following paths.
member.returns: The HTML string containing the script tag or tags for the bundle.
member.param: Set of virtual paths for which to generate script tags.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Scripts.RenderFormat(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Renders script tags for a set of paths based on a format string.
member.returns: The HTML string containing the script tag or tags for the bundle.
member.param: The format string for defining the rendered script tags.
Set of virtual paths for which to generate script tags.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Scripts.Url(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a fingerprinted URL if the is to a bundle, otherwise returns the resolve URL.
member.returns: A that represents the URL.
member.param: The virtual path.

member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.StyleBundle
member.summary: Represents a bundle that does CSS minification.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.StyleBundle.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a virtual path for the bundle.
member.param: A virtual path for the bundle.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.StyleBundle.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with virtual path and CDN path for the bundle.
member.param: A virtual path for the bundle.
A CDN path for the bundle.

member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.Styles
member.summary: Represents a helper class for rendering link elements.

member.name: P:System.Web.Optimization.Styles.DefaultTagFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the default format string for defining how link tags are rendered.
member.returns: The default format string for defining how link tags are rendered.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Styles.Render(System.String[])
member.summary: Renders link tags for a set of paths.
member.returns: A HTML string containing the link tag or tags for the bundle.
member.param: Set of virtual paths for which to generate link tags.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Styles.RenderFormat(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Renders link tags for a set of paths based on a format string.
member.returns: A HTML string containing the link tag or tags for the bundle.
member.param: Format string for defining the rendered link tags.
Set of virtual paths for which to generate link tags.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Styles.Url(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a version-stamped URL for a bundle.
member.returns: A fingerprinted URL.
member.param: The virtual file path.
